What's the consensus on the style of message texts?
E.g.,
    assertTrue("Should be true", someBoolean);
or
    assertTrue("Is true", someBoolean);
or
    assertTrue(someBoolean);    // !
 
I usually use the former; what is typically done "in the real world"?
